brief_description: Manages data files, performs data extraction, loading, and maintains data integrity across the system.
business_purpose: This function handles all aspects of data management including file creation, data loading, extraction operations, and data integrity maintenance. It supports both operational data management and data migration activities, ensuring proper data flow between different system components and maintaining data consistency across the application ecosystem.
key_capabilities: Master data file creation and maintenance

components.name: READACCT
components.business_function: Account master data processing and extraction

components.name: READCARD
components.business_function: Credit card data processing and reporting

components.name: LOADPADB
components.business_function: Authorization data loading and database population
